```{r setup, include=FALSE}
library(ggplot2)

```

```{r}
setwd("~/GitHub/sourcemem/EXPIMG/analysis/data")
dataset <- read.csv('dataset.csv')
dataset <- dataset[dataset$type!=' FOIL', ]
```

```{r}


ssdata <- function(x) {
  rts <- as.numeric(as.character(dataset[dataset$participant==x, "response_RT"]))
  rts <- rts[rts < 1.5]
  return(rts)
}

plot.ssdata <- function(x) {
  png(filename=paste0("ssdata-", x, ".png"))
  plot(ssdata(x), ylim=c(0,1.5))
  abline(v=140, col="red")
  abline(v=280, col="red")
  abline(v=420, col="red")
  abline(v=560, col="red")
  dev.off()
}
```
```{r}
for (i in unique(dataset$participant)){
  plot.ssdata(i)
  print(i)
}
```
